nodes.value: Tender a usar
tend to use
To often or usually do something
I tend to use social media sites when I’m bored.
Aburrido/a
bored
Feeling weary and restless through lack of interest
I get bored if I have nothing to do for a long time.
Nervioso/a
nervous
Easily agitated or alarmed; anxious
Social media makes me feel nervous.
Incómodo/a
uncomfortable
Causing or feeling slight pain or physical discomfort
I’m uncomfortable sharing information with people I don’t know.
Compartir información
sharing information
Giving personal details or data to others
Sharing information online can be risky.
Asombrado/a
amazed
Greatly surprised; filled with astonishment
I’m always amazed by how much useful information you can find.
Información útil
useful information
Information that is helpful or beneficial
Social media can be a source of useful information.
Encontrar (en redes)
find (on social media)
To discover something on social media platforms
You can find old friends on social media.
Herramienta de aprendizaje
learning tool
Something used to facilitate learning
For me, social media is like a learning tool.
Confundido/a en cuanto a por qué
confused as to why
Not understanding the reason for something
I’m confused as to why this app is so popular.
Preocupado/a
worried
Feeling anxious or troubled about actual/potential problems
I’m worried that it actually makes people feel lonely.
Solitario/a
lonely
Sad because one has no friends or company
Some people feel lonely even with many online 'friends'.
En lugar de
instead of
As an alternative to
Instead of calling, many people send messages.
Cientos de
hundreds of
A large number, approximately many times 100
Young people now have hundreds of ‘friends’ they know nothing about.
Emocionado/a por
excited about
Feeling very enthusiastic and eager about something
I’m really excited about the new project.
Cambiar el mundo
change the world
To have a significant impact on global affairs/society
Many believe technology can help people to change the world.
Mantenerse en contacto
keep in touch
To maintain communication with someone
Social media can be a good way to keep in touch with friends.
Chatear / Conversar
chat
To talk in a friendly and informal way
People chat about the latest news online.
Última descarga de música
latest music download
The most recent music obtained from the internet
They talk about the latest music download.
Jugar videojuegos
play games
To engage in games, often electronic
Friends play games with each other online.
Tecnología móvil
mobile technology
Technology used for cellular communication
Many young people use mobile technology.
Generación
generation
All of the people born and living at about the same time
If this generation isn’t happy, they’ll use social media.
Políticos
politicians
People who are professionally involved in politics
They won’t wait for politicians to change things.
Marcar la diferencia
make a difference
To have a significant positive effect on a person/situation
Young people use social media to really make a difference.
¿Usas las redes sociales?
Do you use social media?
¿Cuáles son populares en tu país?
Which ones are popular in your country?
¿Estás de acuerdo con las opiniones de abajo?
Do you agree with the opinions below?
Tiendo a usar sitios de redes sociales cuando estoy aburrido/a y no hay nada mejor que hacer.
I tend to use social media sites when I’m bored and there’s nothing better to do.
Las redes sociales me hacen sentir nervioso/a. Me siento incómodo/a compartiendo información con gente que no conozco.
Social media makes me feel nervous. I’m uncomfortable sharing information with people I don’t know.
Siempre me asombra cuánta información útil puedes encontrar en las redes sociales. Para mí, es como una herramienta de aprendizaje.
I’m always amazed by how much useful information you can find on social media. For me, it’s like a learning tool.
Estoy confundido/a en cuanto a por qué las redes sociales son tan populares. Me preocupa que en realidad hagan sentir solas a las personas.
I’m confused as to why social media is so popular. I’m worried that it actually makes people feel lonely.
En lugar de tener unos pocos amigos realmente buenos con los que pueden hablar, los jóvenes ahora tienen cientos de 'amigos' de los que no saben nada.
Instead of having a few really good friends who they can talk to, young people now have hundreds of ‘friends’ who they know nothing about.
Estoy realmente emocionado/a por las redes sociales porque creo que pueden ayudar a la gente a cambiar el mundo.
I’m really excited about social media because I think it can help people to change the world.
A: La última vez que estuve realmente emocionado/a fue antes de mi fiesta de cumpleaños.
A: The last time I was really excited was before my birthday party.
B: ¿En serio? ¿Qué hiciste?
B: Really? What did you do?
A: Hice una barbacoa en el jardín.
A: I had a barbecue in the garden.
Para algunas personas, las redes sociales podrían ser una buena manera de mantenerse en contacto con amigos, chatear sobre la última descarga de música o jugar videojuegos entre ellos.
For some people, social media might be a good way to keep in touch with friends, chat about the latest music download, or play games with each other.
Pero las redes sociales también están siendo utilizadas por los jóvenes para cambiar el mundo.
But social media is also being used by young people to change the world.
El 43 por ciento de los jóvenes tiene 24 años o menos, y muchos de estos jóvenes usan tecnología móvil.
43 percent of young people are 24 years old or younger, and many of these young people use mobile technology.
Si esta generación no está contenta con algo, no esperarán a que los políticos lo cambien, usarán las redes sociales para cambiar las cosas ellos mismos.
If this generation isn’t happy about something, they won’t wait for politicians to change it, they’ll use social media to change things themselves.
Estos son algunos ejemplos de cómo los jóvenes de todo el mundo usan la tecnología y las redes sociales para realmente marcar la diferencia.
These are some examples of how young people from around the world use technology and social media to really make a difference.

Read the introduction to an article and answer the questions.
¿Qué tipo de situaciones crees que la gente puede cambiar usando las redes sociales?
What kind of situations do you think people can change by using social networks?
¿Cómo crees que podrían hacer esto?
How do you think they might do this?
Lee el resto del artículo. ¿Menciona tus ideas?
Read the rest of the article. Does it mention your ideas?
¿Cómo pueden las redes sociales ayudar a los jóvenes a organizar el cambio político?
How can social media help young people to organize political change?
¿Qué quería hacer McKenna Pope? ¿Tuvo éxito?
What did McKenna Pope want to do? Was she successful?
¿Cómo empezó la fundación Karen Klein?
How did the Karen Klein foundation start?
¿Qué ejemplos en el artículo crees que son buenos usos de las redes sociales?
Which examples in the article do you think are good uses of social media?
¿Usarías las redes sociales para este tipo de cosas? ¿Por qué / Por qué no?
Would you use social media for these kinds of things? Why/Why not?
